title: If It Had Happened Otherwise
description: Alternate history essays written by Winson Churchill, Emil Ludwig, Andre Maurois, G.K. Chesterton, Harold Nicolson, Ronald Knox, H.A.L. Fisher, J.C. Aquire, Hilaire Belloc, Philip Guedalla, Milton Waldman, Charles Petrie, G.M. Trevelyan, and A.J.P. Taylor.
author: J.C. Squire
